feature_model.name: Handle_bars
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Handle_bars (Handle_bars) :m Bicycle (Bicycle) :m Saddle (Saddle) :m Frame (Frame) :m Wheels (Wheels) :m Color (Color) :o Maintenance_plan (Maintenance_plan) :g [1, 1] : lifetime (lifetime) : f2_years (f2_years) : f3_years (f3_years) :o Pedals (Pedals) :o Gears (Gears) :o Rear (Rear) :o Front (Front) :o Warranty (Warranty) :g [1, 1] : d3_years (d3_years) : d2_years (d2_years) : d1_year (d1_year) :g [1, 1] : Carbon (Carbon) :g [1, 1] : White (White) : Black (Black) : Red (Red) : Iron (Iron) : Aluminum (Aluminum) :g [1, 1] : Red2 (Red2) : Blue (Blue) : Green (Green)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~Carbon or Red2 constraint_2:~Green or ~White constraint_3:~Green or ~Black constraint_4:~Green or ~Red constraint_5:~Blue or ~White constraint_6:~Blue or ~Black constraint_7:~Blue or ~Red
